long_description: Uptown, downtown and every adventure in between demand a solid pack that carries your daily essentials in a comfortable, practical manner. The Timbuk2 Uptown daypack is at your service. TSA-compliant, tricot-lined laptop compartment fits up to a 17 in. laptop; no need to take your laptop out of the pack, simply zip it open and lay it flat through security. Large main compartment holds your gear. Front zip pocket fits an iPad or e-reader; also contains multiple-size slot pockets and a small zip pocket for gadgets and accessories. Quick-access, front stash zip pocket accommodates a boarding pass and passport. Includes a side, stretch water bottle pocket. Padded, adjustable shoulder straps and a sternum strap provide comfort and stability. Timbuk2 Uptown daypack is made from durable ballistic fabric; ventilated back panel adds breathable comfort.
short_description: Uptown, downtown and every adventure in between demand a solid pack that carries your daily essentials in a comfortable, practical manner. The Timbuk2 Uptown daypack is at your service.
